origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'HousingFundAPI.get_intercity_loan_policy', 'description': 'This function provides information on the intercity loan policy for housing funds based on the applicant's current city and the destination city.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'city', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The current city of the applicant.'}, {'name': 'destinationCity', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The destination city where the loan is applied.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policyDetails', 'description': 'Details of the intercity loan policy.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 HousingFundAPI.get_intercity_loan_policy, 它的参数输入如下: 'city'是'Shanghai', 'destinationCity'是'Hangzhou'.
